item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】PACK - MADONNA - ALL HER LIVE TOUR ALBUMS (The Virgin Tour 1985 - 2021 Madame X Tour) [ALAC + WAV] {16-24Bit/44.1-88.2kHz} REMASTERED & +
item.description:
Been creating this wonderful folder since yesterday and i just finished

ALL THE MADONNA TOURS AUDIOS IN ONE FOLDER!
DIRECTLY DOWNLOADED FROM APPLE MUSIC IN HI-RES

INCLUDES FAN VERSIONS OF THE ALBUMS IN ALAC, REMASTERED, ENHANCED AND WITH MORE SONGS THAN THE OFFICIAL RELEASES, APART FROM THE OFFICIAL ONES. ALL OF THEM REMASTERED BY “CURTAINS” A BIG MADONNA FAN AND A PRO OF REMASTERING!



THE FOLDER INCLUDES:

THE VIRGIN TOUR
WHO’S THAT GIRL? TOUR
BLOND AMBITION TOUR (2 VERSIONS, CHOOSE YOUR FAV 1)
THE GIRLIE SHOW TOUR
DROWNED WORLD TOUR
RE-INVENTION TOUR [FAN VERSION ONLY]
CONFESSIONS TOUR + FAN VERSION
STICKY & SWEET TOUR + FAN VERSION
MDNA TOUR + FAN VERSION
REBEL HEART TOUR + FAN VERSION
MADAME X TOUR


/NOTES/
(The official first live album by Madonna is “I’m Going To Tell You a Secret” but it is not available on Apple Music, so the folder just includes the FAN VERSION [REINVENTION TOUR])

(All the non official albums are actually taken and remastered from official VHS & Laserdisc video releases, also from some TV broadcastings, starting from THE VIRGIN TOUR - till the DROWNED WORLD TOUR)

MISSING TRACK FROM AN ORIGINAL ALBUM:
Only “13. Get Stupid (Medley) (Live)” from “STICKY & SWEET TOUR” is unavailable since that one and “11. Miles Away (Live)” are not available on Apple Music, though i replaced Miles Away with a FLAC version from Deezer, & Get Stupid Medley wasn’t available on Deezer too, so it’s the only unavailable track in the whole folder. Though it is available on the FAN VERSION STICKY AND SWEET folder!

NOW, ENJOY!


Hidden Content:
You must reply before you can see the hidden data contained here.


THE ALBUMS WERE RECORDED LIVE AT:
THE VIRGIN TOUR - DETROIT, MICHIGAN, U.S.

WHO’S THAT GIRL? TOUR - TOKYO, JAPAN; & TURIN & FLORENCE, ITALY

BLOND AMBITION TOUR - NICE, FRANCE

THE GIRLIE SHOW TOUR - SYDNEY, AUSTRALIA

DROWNED WORLD TOUR - AUBURN HILLS, MICHIGAN, U.S.

RE-INVENTION TOUR - PARIS, FRANCE

CONFESSIONS TOUR - LONDON, ENGLAND

STICKY & SWEET TOUR - BUENOS AIRES, ARGENTINA

MDNA TOUR - MIAMI, FLORIDA

REBEL HEART TOUR - SYDNEY, AUSTRALIA

MADAME X TOUR - LISBON, PORTUGAL​
item.author: TheMagicKingdom

item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossless)】FLAC - Linkin Park - What Are You Worth (“One More Light” sessions) [16 Bit / 44.1 kHZ] (2016)
item.description:
Might be kind of a left field, odd ball request, but given the amount of good Linkin Park material here, it might not be it the worst ask. I've been hoping to source this bonus track from the 2017 picture disc, which I believe is the only place it shows up on vinyl.

Ideally, it can be a raw rip in WAV or AIFF at 96 or 192 kHz. Doesn't need any processing / editing / etc., since I have the tools and know how to do that, I just don't want to have to cop yet another release of the album to pin down one track (I know it's been released elsewhere digitally, but specifically looking for a vinyl source, if possible).
item.author: megabit

item.title: 【HD Live Performances】HDTV - Calum Scott - Rhythm Inside - Let's Sing & Dance for Comic Relief 2017 (BBC One HD 2017-03-04) HDTV 720p-50fps-TPF HDMania
item.description:
Not my rip, recently found a lossless version of this unreleased track digging through Yandex. Recorded during the One More Light album sessions by Mike Shinoda and Brad Delson with producer Brian Howes.

https://linkinpedia.com/wiki/What_Are_You_Worth
